alert.note: Alert for Monroe (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 6:39PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN MONROE COUNTY THROUGH 715 PM EDT... At 639 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rochester, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rochester, Greece, Irondequoit, East Rochester, Webster, Fairport, Brighton, Gates-North Gates, Penfield, Charlotte, Pittsford, Strong Memorial Hospital, Rochester International Airport, and Rochester General Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
